metadata.Title: CVE-2018-18820 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: A buffer overflow was discovered in the URL-authentication backend of the Icecast before 2.4.4. If the backend is enabled, then any malicious HTTP client can send a request for that specific resource including a crafted header, leading to denial of service and potentially remote code execution.

criterions.comment: icecast2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
